又.definition: (once) again; also; both... and...; and yet; (used for emphasis) anyway

又一次.definition: yet again; once again; once more

又名.definition: also known as; alternative name; to also be called

又吵又鬧.definition: to make a lot of noise; to be disorderly

又好氣又好笑.pinyin: you4 hao3 qi4 you4 hao3 xiao4
又好氣又好笑.definition: annoyed and amused in equal measure

又想當婊子又想立牌坊.pinyin: you4 xiang3 dang1 biao3 zi5 you4 xiang3 li4 pai2 fang1
又想當婊子又想立牌坊.definition: lit. to lead the life of a whore but still want a monument put up to one's chastity (idiom); fig. to have bad intentions but still want a good reputation; to want to have one's cake and eat it too

又要馬兒好，又要馬兒不吃草.pinyin: you4 yao4 ma3 r5 hao3 , you4 yao4 ma3 r5 bu4 chi1 cao3
又要馬兒好，又要馬兒不吃草.definition: see 又要馬兒跑，又要馬兒不吃草|又要马儿跑，又要马儿不吃草[you4 yao4 ma3 r5 pao3 , you4 yao4 ma3 r5 bu4 chi1 cao3]

又要馬兒跑，又要馬兒不吃草.pinyin: you4 yao4 ma3 r5 pao3 , you4 yao4 ma3 r5 bu4 chi1 cao3
又要馬兒跑，又要馬兒不吃草.definition: lit. you can't expect the horse to run fast but not let it graze (idiom); fig. you can't have your cake and eat it, too

又雙叒叕.definition: (Internet slang) time after time; again and again and again
